short_summary: This requirement is for: Department of National Defense (DND) has a requirement for Temporary Help Services and has issued a Request for Proposal to suppliers generated from CPSS who are qualified under the streams and categories listed above.
description: Department of National Defense (DND) has a requirement for Temporary Help Services and has issued a Request for Proposal to suppliers generated from CPSS who are qualified under the streams and categories listed above.
full_summary:
# Tender Notice

### **Solicitation Title**
National Capital Region - Three (3) Senior Computer Application Support

### **Reference Number**
cb-6622-41824588

### **Tender Status**
Expired

### **Background**
The Department of National Defense requires Temporary Help Services for Senior Computer Application Support in the National Capital Region.

### **Procurement Details**
* **Procurement Category**: SRV (Services)
* **Procurement Method**: Competitive - Selective Tendering
* **UNSPSC Code**: 80111600 - Temporary Personnel Services
* **Trade Agreements**: Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP), Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)

### **Location**
The contract will be executed in the National Capital Region.

### **Contract Details**
* **Expected Contract Start Date**: 2023-07-10
* **Expected Contract End Date**: 2023-07-07
* **Security Level**: Secret

### **Invitation to Bid**
This tender is open to select Supply Arrangement Holders under EN578-172870 who qualified under the Special Advisor category.

### **Description**
The contract requires Temporary Help Services for Senior Computer Application Support. The resources required must have a minimum security clearance level of Secret.

### **Proposals**
Advanced Chippewa Technologies Inc. BRYCA Solutions Inc. Coradix technology Consulting Ltd. CyberVisor Corporation DLS Technology Corporation GovInsights Consulting Inc. Integra Networks Corporation Lionel Drouin OLAV CONSULTING CORP., MOSHWA ABORIGINAL INFORMATION TECHNOLOGY CORPORATION, IN JOINT VENTURE Portage Personnel Inc. Prologic Systems Ltd. S.I. SYSTEMS ULC SoftSim Technologies Inc. T.E.S. Contract Services INC. The Bell Telephone Company of Canada or Bell Canada/La Compagnie de Téléphone Bell du Canada ou Bell Canada have been invited to submit a proposal.

### **Contact Information**
For further information, please contact CFSG(O-G) Temp Help at [CFSGO-GTemporaryHelp-GSFCO-Gdaidetemporaire@forces.gc.ca](mailto:CFSGO-GTemporaryHelp-GSFCO-Gdaidetemporaire@forces.gc.ca), phone (613) 971-7955.

### **Attachments**
The tender notice and associated documents can be downloaded from [https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/6622/s4477391-rfp
